name: st2stack
description: Streamlit to FastAPI + Next.js scaffold generator

scripts.setup: npm install && cd packages/ir-types && npm install && cd ../api && npm install && cd ../worker && npm install
scripts.test: cd packages/ir-types && npm run build && npm test && cd ../.. && npm run test:scanner && npm run test:parser && npm run test:cli-convert && npm run test:backend-generator && npm run test:frontend-generator && npm run test:validator && npm run validate-ir
